long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- You do what humans do the best: having engaging conversations and build relationship. Rina will do the rest: recording, transcribing, and taking notes.

- No more procrastination on submitting the scorecard. Rina AI creates the write-ups for you base on the conversations. Review and send. Time for some fresh air!

- Experienced recruiting leaders always say that the more notes the better. Rina is your ultimate solution for capturing and organizing proprietary candidate information.
